columns.Conference_ID: The unique identifier for each conference.
columns.Year: The year the conference is held.
columns.Location: The geographical venue of the conference.

conference.table_description: The table stores details about various conferences.

columns.Institution_ID: The unique identifier for each institution.
columns.Institution_Name: The name of the educational institution.
columns.Location: The geographical address of the institution.
columns.Founded: The year the institution was established.

institution.table_description: The table stores information about different educational institutions.

columns.staff_ID: The unique identifier for each staff member.
columns.name: The full name of the staff member.
columns.Age: The age of the staff member in years.
columns.Nationality: The country of citizenship of the staff member.
columns.Institution_ID: The identifier linking staff to their respective institution.

staff.table_description: The table stores information about staff members associated with institutions.

columns.Conference_ID: The unique identifier for each conference participation record.
columns.staff_ID: The unique identifier for each staff member participating.
columns.role: The role of the staff member in the conference.

conference_participation.table_description: The table tracks staff participation roles in various conferences.
